short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate BlueZone Desktop sessions from web scripts, requires URL pattern match to be added (contact your Rocket account executive)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BlueZone Chrome Extension enables developers to communicate with BlueZone/Rocket TE Desktop Edition sessions from web apps running in the Chrome browser. You can make calls to launch sessions, send keys to host systems, read data from the terminal screen, and more.
